title: Ethics Analysis + Safety Implementation
description: AI ethics analysis, bias detection, safety measures, content filtering, and responsible AI practices

criteria.name: Correctness
criteria.description: Accurate bias detection, functional safety measures, effective content filtering, correct ethical analysis.

excellent.description: Comprehensive bias detection across multiple dimensions. Robust safety measures with multiple layers. Effective content filtering with high accuracy. Deep ethical analysis with well-reasoned arguments.

good.description: Good bias detection. Functional safety measures. Working content filters. Solid ethical analysis.

satisfactory.description: Basic bias detection. Simple safety measures. Limited content filtering. Surface-level ethical analysis.

poor.description: Inadequate bias detection. Weak safety measures. Poor content filtering. Superficial ethical analysis.

criteria.name: Code Quality
criteria.description: Safety system architecture, filter implementation quality, bias detection code, system integration.

excellent.description: Professional safety architecture with layered defenses. Clean, maintainable filter implementations. Efficient bias detection algorithms. Well-integrated system components.

good.description: Good safety system structure. Functional filters. Decent bias detection code. Good integration.

satisfactory.description: Basic safety implementation. Simple filters. Working bias detection. Basic integration.

poor.description: Poor safety design. Broken or ineffective filters. Inadequate bias detection. Poor integration.

criteria.name: Documentation
criteria.description: Ethics analysis depth, safety documentation, test case explanations, policy documentation.

excellent.description: Comprehensive ethics report with multiple perspectives and case studies. Detailed safety documentation with threat models. Extensive test cases with ethical justifications. Clear policy guidelines.

good.description: Good ethics analysis. Solid safety documentation. Good test coverage. Clear policies.

satisfactory.description: Basic ethics discussion. Limited safety documentation. Some test cases. Simple policies.

poor.description: Minimal ethics analysis. Poor documentation. Few test cases. No clear policies.

criteria.name: Creativity
criteria.description: Novel ethical insights, innovative safety measures, creative bias detection, thoughtful recommendations.

excellent.description: Deep, original ethical insights. Innovative safety mechanisms. Creative bias detection approaches. Thoughtful, actionable recommendations for responsible AI.

good.description: Interesting ethical perspectives. Enhanced safety features. Good bias detection strategies. Solid recommendations.

satisfactory.description: Standard ethical analysis. Basic safety measures. Common bias detection methods. Generic recommendations.

poor.description: No original thinking. Copy-pasted safety measures. No creative insights. Weak recommendations.

allowedTools: GitHub Copilot for code syntax and structure
Stack Overflow for filter implementation patterns
Research papers and ethical frameworks for reference
prohibited: Using AI to generate entire ethics essays
AI-written ethical analysis without critical thinking
aiUsagePolicy.guidelines: AI can help with code structure, but ethical analysis and safety design must demonstrate your own critical thinking and understanding of responsible AI principles.

deliverables: Python file (practical7.py) with safety measures and bias detection implementation
Content filter system with multiple categories (harmful, biased, toxic, etc.)
Bias detection module analyzing gender, race, age, and other dimensions
Safety wrapper for LLM API with input/output filtering
Ethics analysis report (2000+ words) covering: AI bias, fairness, transparency, privacy, accountability, and societal impact
Test cases demonstrating safety measures against adversarial inputs
Policy recommendations document for responsible AI deployment
README.md with implementation details and ethical considerations
learningObjectives: Identify and mitigate biases in AI systems
Implement multi-layered safety measures for LLM applications
Design effective content filtering and moderation systems
Analyze ethical implications of AI deployment
Develop responsible AI policies and guidelines
Test systems against adversarial and harmful inputs
evaluationFocus: Depth of ethical analysis and critical thinking
Accuracy and coverage of bias detection
Quality of test cases and edge case handling
